typeSystemDescription.name: Baleen Type System - Semantics
typeSystemDescription.description:
XML definition of the Baleen type system semantic annotations.
This XML file classified as UK OFFICIAL.

typeDescription.name: uk.gov.dstl.baleen.types.semantic.Entity
typeDescription.description: Type to represent named entities - values that are assigned a semantic type.

featureDescription.name: value
featureDescription.description: A value which reflects the name of the entity. May or may not differ from underlying span from the document.

featureDescription.name: referent
featureDescription.description: Can be used to link a corefence to an entity to another (presuambly more definitive) mention of the same entity elsewhere in the text.

featureDescription.name: isNormalised
featureDescription.description: Marks the entity value as having been normalised from the original value

featureDescription.name: subType
featureDescription.description: String identifying sub type of entity.

typeDescription.name: uk.gov.dstl.baleen.types.semantic.Relation
typeDescription.description: Records a relationship between named entities, explicitly mentioned within the source document.

featureDescription.name: relationshipType
value
featureDescription.description: The value of the relationship, typically the spanning text within the sentence

featureDescription.name: relationSubType
featureDescription.description: Used to record any sub-type information for the relation, for example the sub-relations defined within the ACE dataset.

typeDescription.name: uk.gov.dstl.baleen.types.semantic.Temporal
typeDescription.description: General type to record temporal (time based) information mentioned within the document. This is a general purpose type that is extended in "time" types.

typeDescription.name: uk.gov.dstl.baleen.types.semantic.Location
typeDescription.description: A reference to a place, country, administrative region or geo-political entity within the source document. This is a general purpose type that is extended in "geo" types.

featureDescription.name: geoJson
featureDescription.description: A strnig representation of geoJson format represention of geographic information associated with the location, including where possible coordinate(s).

typeDescription.name: uk.gov.dstl.baleen.types.semantic.Event
typeDescription.description: An temporal interaction of interest, covering political, organisational, miltiary, criminal or social interactions mentioned within the document.

featureDescription.name: occurrence
featureDescription.description: The time-based information relating to the event.

typeDescription.name: uk.gov.dstl.baleen.types.semantic.ReferenceTarget
typeDescription.description: A target type for the referent property, such that entities pointing to the same target are assumed to be coreferences. The target can therefore be thought of as a super-entity, though it has no properties or value of it's own. The span of this entity is taken to be the scope in which this reference target is valid.
